alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 09 at 11:41PM EST until January 11 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northern New Hampshire and west central and western Maine. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An arctic cold front will move across the region by late Monday afternoon. The coldest air of the season thus far will follow for Monday night and Tuesday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
